rease
Class ReplaceNodeTypes

java.lang.Object
  rease.ReplaceNodeTypes

public class ReplaceNodeTypes
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the parameters for replacement of single node types within a NED topology file by another node type

Author:
Pascal Zschumme, Thomas Gamer
